Posts.Content: CSflorida wrote: My sister has just been diagnosed with IDC, seems early stage, small dimensions...we are meeting with the surgeon on Tuesday. How do we know he is good? I want her to have the best care and doctors. And I am not familar with the area she lives in.Â  Any suggestions on how to research the surgeon, should she get a second opinon regardless?
